dt: {bc}items (as of {d_link|cloth|cloth}) designed to be worn to cover the body

dt.t: The children and their teachers strolled up the path, the colors of their winter {wi}clothing{/wi} bright against the monotone of the field.
… radiating vibrance through her bright {wi}clothing{/wi} and makeup.
… seeks to regulate and adopt flammability standards to upholstered furniture, mattresses, bed {wi}clothing{/wi} and candles.

shortdef: items (as of cloth) designed to be worn to cover the body; also : coverings
